description:
When the rosary on Akashiya Moka`s chest is removed, the seal breaks off and her inner self is awakened. Rated as an S-class monster, the inner Moka is a powerful and ruthless vampire, possessing a completely different personality to the original kind and sweet-looking Moka. Although she is merciless towards her enemies, she does care for Tsukune, Moka`s first friend in Youkai Academy and the only person who can take off the rosary on Moka`s chest.
This is Moka`s true form.
name: Ura Moka
